title: Mixed Knowledge Quiz
description: A mix of question types covering science, geography, and general knowledge.

questions.question: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
questions.explanation: At standard atmospheric pressure (sea level), water boils at exactly 100°C.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars gets its reddish colour from iron oxide (rust) on its surface.

questions.question: Which of these are noble gases?
questions.explanation: Noble gases occupy Group 18 of the periodic table. Nitrogen and oxygen are not noble gases.

questions.question: What is the largest ocean on Earth?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean covers roughly 165.25 million square kilometres.

questions.question: Sound travels faster through water than through air.
questions.explanation: Sound travels at about 1,480 m/s in water versus roughly 343 m/s in air.
